titleInfo.title: Letter from William Bruce, Resident at Bushire, to Francis Warden, Chief Secretary to the Government of Bombay

mods.abstract: Letter details an account of six boats, mostly from Muscat, that had been captured by a fleet of boats from Ras el Khima [Ras al-Khaimah] and their crews killed. The letter also states that the horses that had been on board the bugulah Darabee, captured by pirates in January 1815, had been sent to Muscat. Bruce exhorts the East India Company to take decisive action against the pirates.
